content: I have a pretty strong preference to keep everything in one document.  OpenRPC has tooling already built around it that is pretty nice, so that is my preference.

author: sky.cactus
content: For the documentation, my inclination is to use the stuff the ETC team built for rendering, and perhaps submit some upstream PRs if we want additional features added (like example payloads/responses which I think is a cool idea).
